review: I absolutely love it. I bought a fire tv for the family room & a fire stick for the bedroom. Here are the minor differences -  both come with a remote but the fire tv remote has voice activated controls. No worry because there is an smartphone app that gives the same control for the fire stick.  If running through a DVR I'm guessing you need the fire tv because you use an Ethernet cable to run through it and hdmi cable to connect it all.  I've had to reboot the stick twice but it was simple, especially with the prompt 24 hour amazon service. I love that I can stream my amazon prime music playlists & watch videos I've uploaded to my YouTube account. This is a fantastic device.  Love it.
